# Documentation Index

Welcome to the pob-api-extended documentation. This directory contains comprehensive documentation for users and developers.

## User Documentation

### Getting Started
- **[Complete API Reference](API_REFERENCE.md)** - Comprehensive API documentation with all methods, properties, and examples
- **[API Capabilities](API_CAPABILITIES_EN.md)** - Overview of what can be extracted from Path of Building import codes
- **[Build Creation Capabilities](BUILD_CREATION_CAPABILITIES_EN.md)** - Guide to programmatically creating builds

### Calculation Engine
- **[Calculation Engine](CALCULATION_ENGINE.md)** - Overview of the Python calculation engine
- **[Calculation Architecture](CALCULATION_ARCHITECTURE.md)** - Detailed architecture of the calculation system

## Developer Documentation

### Architecture
- **[Architecture Review](ARCHITECTURE.md)** - Complete architecture review including SOLID principles and design patterns
- **[Class Diagram](CLASS_DIAGRAM.md)** - Complete class diagrams with attributes, properties, and methods
- **[POB Comparison](POB_COMPARISON.md)** - Comparison with Path of Building Lua implementation

### Implementation Details
- **[DAT Parsing Logic](DAT_PARSING_LOGIC.md)** - Logic for parsing DAT files from PyPoE
- **[Game Data Loading](GAME_DATA_LOADING.md)** - How game data is loaded and used
- **[Gems Implementation Status](GEMS_IMPLEMENTATION_STATUS.md)** - Status of skill gem implementation
- **[Unique Items](UNIQUE_ITEMS_COMPLETE.md)** - Unique items implementation details

### Testing
- **[Integration Test Coverage](INTEGRATION_TEST_COVERAGE.md)** - Comprehensive overview of integration test coverage
- **[Integration Coverage Analysis](INTEGRATION_COVERAGE_ANALYSIS.md)** - Research on integration coverage vs code coverage

### Planning Documents
- **[Implementation Time Estimate](IMPLEMENTATION_TIME_ESTIMATE.md)** - Time estimates for various features
- **[Nodes Implementation Plan](NODES_IMPLEMENTATION_PLAN.md)** - Plan for passive tree nodes implementation
- **[Python Calculation Feasibility](PYTHON_CALCULATION_FEASIBILITY.md)** - Feasibility study for Python calculation engine

## Archive

Historical documents and reports are stored in the [history/](history/) directory:
- Architecture reviews
- Improvement reports
- Test reports
- Coverage analysis
- Refactoring reports

## Language

All documentation is in English. Historical documents in other languages are archived in the `history/` directory.

## Contributing

When adding new documentation:
1. Write in English
2. Follow the existing structure
3. Update this README if adding new major sections
4. Place historical/archival documents in `history/`
